anya-e1203n:308: Gantvā so dhammarājā vanamisipatanaṃ saññatānaṃ niketaṃ,
anya-e1203n:316: Obhāso pātubhuto sapadi bahuvidhaṃ āsi accherakañca.
anya-e1203n:319: Tato paṭṭhāya so satthā vinento devamānuse,
anya-e1203n:325: Yakkhānaṃ samitiṃ gantvā ṭhatvāna gagane tahiṃ;
anya-e1203n:341: Datvā namassituṃ kese agā jetavanaṃ jino.
anya-e1203n:386: So satthā sumane kūṭe dassesi padalañchanaṃ.
anya-e1203n:419: Subhaddaṃ majjhime yāme pāpetvā amataṃ padaṃ.
anya-e1203n:433: Ahatehi ca vatthehi veṭhetvā paṭhamaṃ jinaṃ;
anya-e1203n:446: Citakaṃ taṃ na sakkhiṃsu gāhāpetuṃ hutāsanaṃ.
anya-e1203n:455: Na masi satthudehassa daḍḍhassāsi na chārikā.
anya-e1203n:460: Uṇhīsaṃ akkhakā dve ca catasso dantadhātuyo;
anya-e1203n:461: Iccetā dhātuyo satta vippakiṇṇā na satthuno.
anya-e1203n:482: Gantvā sake sake raṭṭhe cetiyāni akārayuṃ.
anya-e1203n:487: Dantadhātuṃ tato khemo attanā gahitaṃ adā;
anya-e1203n:490: Desayitvāna so dhammaṃ bhetvā sabbā kudiṭṭhiyo;
anya-e1203n:568: Taṃ dhātuṃ pūjayitvāna rājāno pubbakā idha;
anya-e1203n:572: Pūjayanti samāgamma dhātuṃ taṃ satthuno iti.
anya-e1203n:574: Tassāmaccassa so rājā sutvā dhammaṃ subhāsitaṃ;
anya-e1203n:577: Dhātupūjaṃ karonto so rājā acchariyā vahaṃ;
anya-e1203n:584: Pabbājesi sakā raṭṭhā nigaṇṭhe te asesake.
anya-e1203n:599: Nindanno tādise deve chavaṭṭhiṃ vandate iti.
anya-e1203n:605: Pūjitaṃ taṃ chavaṭṭhiñca tena rattindivaṃ iti.
anya-e1203n:613: Sutvā āgamanaṃ tassa kaliṅgo so mahipati;
anya-e1203n:622: Tato so sumano gantvā paviṭṭho rājamandiraṃ;
anya-e1203n:638: Jano hi avajānanto addhā so vañcito iti.
anya-e1203n:644: Tena saddhiṃ mahagghaṃ taṃ agamā dhātumandiraṃ.
anya-e1203n:690: Accheraṃ taṃ parama ruciraṃ cittayāno narindo,
anya-e1203n:697: Taṃ sāsanaṃ paṇḍunarādhipassa ñāpesi dhīro duratikkamaṃ’ti.
anya-e1203n:699: Rājātato dantapuraṃ dhajehi pupphehi dhūpehi ca toraṇehi;
anya-e1203n:703: Samubbahanto sirasā nijena mahārahaṃ dhātukaraṇḍakaṃ taṃ.
anya-e1203n:714: Kaliṅghanātho kusumādikehi naccehi gītehi ca vāditehi;
anya-e1203n:715: Dine dine addhani dantadhātuṃ pūjesi saddhiṃ vanadevatāhi.
anya-e1203n:718: Ādāya dhātuṃ manujādhinātho agā puraṃ pāṭali puttanāmaṃ.
anya-e1203n:720: Rājādhirājo’tha sabhāya majjhe disvāna taṃ vītabhayaṃ visaṅkaṃ;
anya-e1203n:730: Mohandhabhutā atha titthiyā te taṃ dantadhātuṃ abhinikkhipiṃsu.
anya-e1203n:735: Tasmiṃ khaṇe paṅkaja kaṇṇikāya patiṭṭhahitvā jinadantadhātu;
anya-e1203n:736: Kundāvadātāhi pabhāhi sabbā disā pabhāsesi pabhassarāhi.
anya-e1203n:738: Disvāna taṃ acchariyaṃ manussā pasannacittā ratanādikehi;
anya-e1203n:741: So paṇḍurājā pana diṭṭhijālaṃ cirānubaddhaṃ apariccajanto;
anya-e1203n:745: Pubbācalaṭṭho’va sudhāmarīci jotesi raṃsīhi disā samantā.
anya-e1203n:747: Disvānubhāvaṃ jinadantadhātu yāpajji so vimbhaya maggarājā;
anya-e1203n:748: Eko’tha issāpasuto nigaṇṭho taṃ rājarājānamidaṃ avoca.
anya-e1203n:750: Rāmādayo deva janaddanassa nānāvatārā bhuvane ahesuṃ;
anya-e1203n:753: Addhā manussattamupāgatassa devassa pacchā tidivaṃ gatassa;
anya-e1203n:760: Yaṭicchitaṃ gaṇhatha vatthujātaṃ iccāha rājā mukhare nigaṇṭhe.
anya-e1203n:762: Te titthiyā viṇahusuraṃ guṇehi vicitta rūpehi abhitthavitvā;
anya-e1203n:763: Toyena siñciṃsu saṭhā tathāpi ṭhitappadesā na calittha dhātu.
anya-e1203n:765: Jigucchamāno atha te nigaṇṭhe so dhātuyānīharaṇe upāyaṃ;
anya-e1203n:766: Anvesamāno vasudhādhinātho bheriṃ carāpesi sake puramhi.
anya-e1203n:772: Tasmiṃ pure seṭṭhisuto subhaddo pāvekkhirañño samitiṃ pagabbho.
anya-e1203n:774: Tamaggarājaṃ atha so namitvā sāmājikānaṃ hadayaṅgamāya;
anya-e1203n:777: Bhumiṃ kiṇitvā mahatā dhanena manoramaṃ jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ;
anya-e1203n:778: Yo kārayitvāna jinassa datvā upaṭṭhahi taṃ catupaccayehi.
anya-e1203n:786: Chaddantanāgo savisena viddho sallena yo lohitamakkhi taṅgo;
anya-e1203n:787: Chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi samujjalante chetvāna luddāya adāsi dante.
anya-e1203n:792: Yo bodhiyā bāhiravatthudānā atittarūpo sivirāja seṭṭho;
anya-e1203n:793: Adāsi cakkhūni pabhassarāni dvijāya jiṇṇāya acakkhukāya.
anya-e1203n:798: Yo dhammapālo api sattamāsa jātopaduṭṭhe janakesakamhi;
anya-e1203n:799: Kārāpayante asimālakammaṃ cittaṃ na dūsesi patāparāje.
anya-e1203n:801: Sākhāmigo yo asatā pumena vane papātā sayamuddhaṭena;
anya-e1203n:802: Silāya bhinne’pi sake lalāṭe taṃ khemabhumiṃ anayitthamūḷhaṃ.
anya-e1203n:805: Samuṭṭhite sajjumahāravinde ṭhatvāna yo seṭṭhi adāsi dānaṃ.
anya-e1203n:810: Yo sattavasso visikhāya paṃsu kīḷāparo sambhavanāmako’pi;
anya-e1203n:813: Hitvā nikantiṃ sakajīvite’pi baddhāsakucchimhi ca vettavalliṃ;
anya-e1203n:817: Isī’va katvā atha ñāyaganthaṃ nijaṃ pavattesi cirāya dhammaṃ.
anya-e1203n:831: Buddho bhavitvā api diṭṭhadhamma sukhānapekkho karuṇānuvattī;
anya-e1203n:835: Ajeyyasatthaṃ paramiddhipattaṃ damesi yo ālavakampī yakkhaṃ.
anya-e1203n:838: Bhetvāna diṭṭhiṃ sucirānubaddhaṃ damesi yo brahmavaraṃ munindo.
anya-e1203n:844: Mahādayo duppasahaṃ parehi damesi yo aṅgulimālacoraṃ.
anya-e1203n:847: Saddhamma saññaṃ ratanākarañca ogāhayī saṃ parisaṃ samaggaṃ.
anya-e1203n:852: Anena saccena jinassa dhātu khippaṃ samāruyha nabhantarāḷaṃ;
anya-e1203n:855: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sā jinadantadhātu nabhaṃ samuggamma pabhāsayantī;
anya-e1203n:856: Sabbā disā osadhitārakā’va janaṃ pasādesi vtiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ.
anya-e1203n:858: Athotaritvā gaganaṅgaṇamhā sā matthake seṭṭhisutassa tassa;
anya-e1203n:861: Dasvāna taṃ acchariyaṃ nigaṇṭhā iccabravuṃ paṇḍunarādhipaṃ taṃ;
anya-e1203n:862: Vijjābalaṃ seṭṭhisutassa etaṃ na dhātuyā deva ayampabhāvo.
anya-e1203n:864: Nisamma tesaṃ vacanaṃ narindo iccabravī seṭṭhisutaṃ subhaddaṃ;
anya-e1203n:865: Yathā ca ete abhisaddaheyyuṃ tathāvidhaṃ dassaya iddhimaññaṃ.
anya-e1203n:870: Sā rājahaṃ sī’va vidhāvamānā sugandhitoyamhi padakkhiṇena;
anya-e1203n:871: Ummujjamānā ca nimujjamānā jane pamodassudhare akāsi.
anya-e1203n:873: Tato ca kāsuṃ visikhāyamajjhe katvā tahiṃ dhātumabhikkhipitvā;
anya-e1203n:874: Paṃsūhi sammā abhipūrayitvā bahūhi maddāpayi kuñjarehi.
anya-e1203n:880: Obhāsayanti’va disā pabhāhi diṭṭhā muhuttena jinassadhātu.
anya-e1203n:882: Khipiṃsu vatthābharaṇāni maccā pavassayuṃ pupphamayañca vassaṃ;
anya-e1203n:883: Ukkuṭṭhisaddehi ca sadhukāranādehi puṇṇaṃ nagaraṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e1203n:885: Te titthiyā taṃ abhivañcanaṃ’ti rājādhirājaṃ atha saññapetvā;
anya-e1203n:886: Jigucchanīye kuṇapādikehi khipiṃsu dhātuṃ parikhāya piṭṭhe.
anya-e1203n:889: Madhubbatālī virutābhirāmā ahosi sā pokkharaṇī’va nandā.
anya-e1203n:891: Gajādhipā koññcaravaṃ raviṃsu kariṃsu hesāninadaṃ turaṅgā;
anya-e1203n:895: Vatthāni sīse bhamayiṃsu mattā bhujāni poṭhesumudaggacittā.
anya-e1203n:901: Atthe niyojetu mupecca tassa vadiṃsu paṇḍussa narādhipassa.
anya-e1203n:903: Disvāna yo īdisakampi rāja iddhānubhāvaṃ munipuṅgavassa;
anya-e1203n:904: Pasādamattampi kareyya noce kimatthiyā tassa bhaveyya paññā.
anya-e1203n:906: Pasādanīyesu guṇesu rāja pasādanaṃ sādhujanassa dhammo;
anya-e1203n:907: Pupphanti sabbe sayameva vande samuggate komudakānanāni.
anya-e1203n:909: Vācāya tesaṃ pana dummatīnaṃ mā saggamaggaṃ pajahittha rāja;
anya-e1203n:910: Andhe gahetvā vicareyya ko hi anvesamāno supathaṃ amūḷho.
anya-e1203n:912: Narādhipā kappiṇa bimbisāra suddhodanādi api tejavantā;
anya-e1203n:913: Taṃ dhammarājaṃ saraṇaṃ upecca piviṃsu dhammāmatamādarena.
anya-e1203n:916: Upecca dhammaṃ vimalaṃ nisamma alattha āyuṃ api diṭṭhadhammo.
anya-e1203n:922: Senāpatiṃ atthavaraṃ avoca pahaṭṭhabhāvo parisāya majjhe.
anya-e1203n:925: Cirāya dulladdhipathe caranto ṭhito sarajje api vañcitohaṃ.
anya-e1203n:927: Mohena khajjopanakaṃ dhamesiṃ sītaddito dhumasikhe jalante;
anya-e1203n:928: Pipāsito sindhujalaṃ pahāya piviṃ pamādena marīcitoyaṃ.
anya-e1203n:930: Pariccajitvā amataṃ cirāya jivatthiko tikkhavisaṃ akhādiṃ;
anya-e1203n:933: Gantvāna khippaṃ parikhā samīpaṃ ārādhayitvā jinadantadhātuṃ;
anya-e1203n:934: Ānehi pūjāvidhinā karissaṃ puññāni sabbattha sukhāvahāni.
anya-e1203n:937: Dhātuṃ munindassa namassamāno ajjhesi rañño hitamā caranto
anya-e1203n:939: Cirāgataṃ diṭṭhimalaṃ pahāya alattha saddhaṃ sugate narindo;
anya-e1203n:942: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pokkharaṇī vicittā phullehi sovaṇṇasaroruhehi;
anya-e1203n:946: Kundāvadātāhi pabhāhi sabbaṃ khirodakucchiṃ’va puraṃ akāsi.
anya-e1203n:949: Sandissamānā mahatā janena mahapphalaṃ mānusakaṃ akattha.
anya-e1203n:960: Vīmaṃsanatthāya tavādhunāpi mayā kataṃ sabbamidaṃ muninda;
anya-e1203n:961: Āguṃ mahantaṃ khama bhuripañña khippaṃ mamālaṅkuru uttamaṅgaṃ.
anya-e1203n:963: Patiṭṭhitā tassa tato kirīṭe maṇippabhā bhāsini dantadhātu;
anya-e1203n:964: Amuñci raṃsī dhavalā pajāsu sinehajātā iva khīradhārā.
anya-e1203n:970: Patiṭṭhapetvāna jinassa dhātuṃ pūjesi rājā ratanādikehi.
anya-e1203n:973: Hitvā vihiṃsaṃ karuṇādhivāso ārādhayī sabbajanaṃ guṇehi.
anya-e1203n:978: Vaḍḍhesi so dhātugharamhi dhātuṃ alaṅkaritvā sakalaṃ purampi;
anya-e1203n:979: Sesena pūjāvidhinā atitto pūjesi raṭṭhaṃ sadhanaṃ sabhoggaṃ.
anya-e1203n:1026: Nikhila guṇa nivāso so kumāro karitvā;
anya-e1203n:1057: Nahi sati mama dehe dhātumaññassa dassaṃ,
anya-e1203n:1058: Ahamapi yadi jetuṃ neva te sakkuṇeyyaṃ.
anya-e1203n:1065: Tavaca mamaca ko vā sīhaḷe bandhubhūto,
anya-e1203n:1075: Mama ca piyasahāyo so mahāsena rājā,
anya-e1203n:1093: Turita turita bhūto so puramhā paḷāyi.
anya-e1203n:1264: Itthaṃ buddhisute bhujaṅgajanitaṃ bhītiṃ sametvā gate,
anya-e1203n:1265: Sā nāvā pavanā pakampitadhajā tuṅgaṃ taraṅgāvaliṃ;
anya-e1203n:1293: Sabbā disā ca vidisā ca ghanandhakārā
anya-e1203n:1489: Sabbe’pi te atha nikāya nivāsi bhikkhū,
anya-e1203n:1495: Rājā avo ca puna bhikkhugaṇassa majjhe;
anya-e1203n:1556: Tuṭṭhā tahiṃ yatigaṇā manujā ca sabbe,
